json_to_edit.voice_over: Who could have imagined that a single butterfly could bring the world to its knees?
json_to_edit.description: A genetically modified butterfly escapes from Dr. Chen's lab, triggering a chain of global catastrophes.
json_to_edit.lighting: Varies from bright daylight to ominous storm lighting
json_to_edit.name: The Butterfly Effect
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A butterfly's escape leads to worldwide chaos, as scientists and leaders scramble to understand and contain the unfolding disaster.

qa.action: A vibrant blue butterfly escapes through a crack in the lab window.

hf.action: Thousands of butterflies swarm over a cityscape, blocking out the sun.

tr.action: Dr. Chen frantically types on her computer, trying to track the butterfly's genetic spread.

xc.action: Jack Harper follows Mayor Thompson as she hurries to an emergency press conference.

ka.action: Massive storm systems form over continents, visible from space.

fn.action: Professor Winters and Dr. Chen debate heatedly over a map covered in butterfly migration patterns.

edit_command: Add three more shots to show the escalating global crisis. Include a shot of panicked crowds, one of military response, and another showing environmental impact. Describe each new shot in detail.

updated_json.voice_over: Who could have imagined that a single butterfly could bring the world to its knees?
updated_json.description: A genetically modified butterfly escapes from Dr. Chen's lab, triggering a chain of global catastrophes.
updated_json.lighting: Varies from bright daylight to ominous storm lighting
updated_json.name: The Butterfly Effect
updated_json.scene_summary: A butterfly's escape leads to worldwide chaos, as scientists and leaders scramble to understand and contain the unfolding disaster.

qa.action: A vibrant blue butterfly escapes through a crack in the lab window.

hf.action: Thousands of butterflies swarm over a cityscape, blocking out the sun.

tr.action: Dr. Chen frantically types on her computer, trying to track the butterfly's genetic spread.

xc.action: Jack Harper follows Mayor Thompson as she hurries to an emergency press conference.

ka.action: Massive storm systems form over continents, visible from space.

yz.action: Panicked crowds flood the streets of a major city, desperately trying to escape as swarms of butterflies descend upon them. People push and shove, overturning cars and breaking store windows in their frenzy.

fn.action: Professor Winters and Dr. Chen debate heatedly over a map covered in butterfly migration patterns.

lm.action: Military helicopters fly low over a devastated landscape. Soldiers in hazmat suits deploy from the choppers, attempting to contain swarms of butterflies with specialized nets and chemical sprays. In the background, fires rage and infrastructure crumbles.

op.sfx_keywords: cracking ice, rushing water, animal cries
op.action: A vast glacier rapidly melts, releasing torrents of water. Nearby, forests wither and turn brown as butterflies consume the vegetation. Various animals flee the changing landscape, their habitats destroyed in a matter of hours.

label.rationale: we will add three new shots to the scene to show the escalating global crisis as requested. these shots will be added to the existing six shots, bringing the total to nine. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field accordingly and add detailed descriptions for each new shot. the new shots will be inserted at appropriate points in the sequence to maintain a logical flow of events. we'll also update the "list_display_order" to include the new shots.

value.action: Panicked crowds flood the streets of a major city, desperately trying to escape as swarms of butterflies descend upon them. People push and shove, overturning cars and breaking store windows in their frenzy.

Military helicopters fly low over a devastated landscape. Soldiers in hazmat suits deploy from the choppers, attempting to contain swarms of butterflies with specialized nets and chemical sprays. In the background, fires rage and infrastructure crumbles.
